name: Covid Lives Matter
description:
At the game beginning, the virus starts with 30 seconds of life.

Use keyboard arrows to control the virus, when you press UPARROW it jumps.

If the face shield touch virus, virus losses 5 seconds of life.

When the hand sanitizer touches the ground, it breaks, dropping the content in direction of virus. If the hand sanitizer content touch the virus, it slow virus down.

If the vaccine touchs virus, it dies instantaneously. The vaccine ever spans in the same X position of the virus.
